Some time ago, a website talked about the dangers of sharing where you are on the internet. The website said that when you tell people where you are, you are also telling everyone else, not just your friends. This made people think about the risks of sharing too much on the internet.
The internet is like a big ocean, and we can share many things with many people. We can share our thoughts, photos, and stories. But sometimes we forget that what we say online can be seen by many people, not just our friends. This can lead to problems.
A long time ago, some brave people started sharing their lives online. They shared their thoughts, photos, and stories, just like we do today. They faced many problems, like losing their jobs or getting into trouble. But they learned from their experiences and taught us what to do.
One of these pioneers was a young man named Justin Hall. He started sharing his life online in 1994. He shared his thoughts, photos, and art. He even shared things that some people might not want to hear. But he did it in a way that was beautiful and interesting.
Justin's story is important because it shows us that sharing our lives online can be risky. We need to be careful about what we share and who we share it with. Another example is a woman named Heather Armstrong. She started a blog and shared her thoughts about her job. But someone found her blog and shared it with her boss, and she lost her job.
We need to remember that what we say online can affect our real lives. We should be careful and think about what we share before we share it.

A long time ago, some scientists were worried about a low-budget movie called What the Bleep Do We Know?. This movie talked about things we don't understand about the universe. The scientists thought the movie was not very good and was saying things that weren't true. But I watched the movie and didn't understand why it was so important at first. Then I saw some amazing things, like how water can be affected by our thoughts. Some people think this is very interesting, but scientists are not so sure. They want to see more proof before they believe it.
I know what the scientists mean. This idea is very exciting, but it's also very strange. It's like magic. But before we can believe it, we need to see more evidence. The movie didn't show enough proof, so scientists were not happy.
But the truth is, scientists are still learning many new things about the universe. They have found out that the universe is made of things we don't understand, like a special kind of matter and a mysterious force. They have also found out that our brains work in strange ways, and that our thoughts can affect our bodies. And they are still trying to understand how life began on Earth and how we are connected to the universe.
The scientists are not trying to know everything. They are just trying to learn more about the world and the universe. And what they are learning is that the universe is very, very strange and amazing.

I like writing short stories. It's easy and fun. Writing novels is harder. It's like planting a big forest, while writing short stories is like planting a small garden. Both are important to me. When I finish a novel, I like to write some short stories. When I finish some short stories, I want to write a novel. I never write short stories and a novel at the same time.
I started writing short stories in 1984. It was a little difficult at first, but it was fun. I liked the feeling of creating something new. My readers liked it too. One of my first short stories was called "Breaking Waves". It was part of a collection of stories called "Tales from Abroad".
I like writing short stories because they don't take a long time. It usually takes me a week to finish one. It's quick and easy. Writing novels takes a long time, sometimes a year or two. It's hard to keep going. Writing short stories helps me take a break.
I like that I can write short stories about anything, even a small idea or a picture in my mind. It's like improvising music. If the story doesn't work out, it's okay. I can try again. Even famous writers like F. Scott Fitzgerald and Raymond Carver don't always write great short stories. I learn from my mistakes and use them to make my next story better.
Writing short stories helps me when I write novels. It's like a special place where I can try new things and learn. My short stories are like little memories I've left behind. I remember where I wrote each one and how I felt. Writing short stories makes me happy because I can share my feelings with my readers.

Here is a simplified version of the passage for an A1 learner:
Science is very important. It helps us understand the world and make new discoveries. But it's not always easy. Sometimes scientists disagree with each other. They try to find new ideas and prove old ones wrong. This can be exciting, but it can also be confusing.
Science has changed a lot over time. In the past, people thought the Earth was flat. Then, scientists discovered that it's round. Later, they found out that the Earth goes around the Sun. This new information changed the way people thought about the world.
Science is not just about finding new facts. It's also about understanding how things work. Scientists try to figure out how the universe began and how it will end. They also try to understand how living things work, like plants and animals.
But science is not always perfect. Sometimes scientists make mistakes. They might think they know something, but later they find out they were wrong. This is okay, because it helps them learn and improve.
Science is important because it helps us make new things and solve problems. It can also help us understand the world better. But we need to be careful with science. We need to make sure it's used for good and not for bad.
Non-scientists, like you and me, need to pay attention to science. We need to understand what scientists are doing and how it might affect our lives. We can't just sit back and let scientists do all the work. We need to be involved and make sure science is used wisely.
I made the following changes to simplify the passage:
* Shortened sentences and paragraphs to make them easier to understand
* Removed complex vocabulary and phrases
* Used simpler sentence structures
* Added examples to help illustrate scientific concepts
* Emphasized the importance of science and its impact on our lives
* Removed the tone of criticism and skepticism to make the passage more positive and encouraging.

For a long time, people thought that ebooks would replace print books. But now, some big publishers are saying that ebook sales are not growing as much as they used to. One person in the publishing business even said that the excitement about ebooks might have been too much. They thought that ebooks would be very popular, but now they are not as sure.
Some people still think that ebooks will replace print books. But this is not true. Ebooks and print books can coexist. We use both in different ways.
The idea that one medium will replace another is not new. People have been saying this about new technologies for a long time. When TV came out, some people thought radio would stop being popular. But radio is still here and people still listen to it.
The same thing happened with books. When the phonograph came out, people thought books would disappear. But books are still here and people still read them.
We have strong feelings about new technologies. We like some things about them and we are scared of others. We also like to remember the old ways and we are afraid of losing things that are important to us.
When new technologies come out, we often think about the old ways and how they will change. We might feel sad that things are changing, but we also like to imagine what the future will be like.
The story about the death of the book is a common story that we tell ourselves. It helps us understand how we feel about change and new technologies.

Every day, I wake up early and write about how famous people from the past did their daily routines. I want to show how they found time to do their best work and be creative. I look at what they ate, when they slept and worked, and how they spent their time. This helps me understand their personalities and careers better.
I think that knowing what someone eats and when they take a nap can tell us a lot about who they are. This book is about how creative people do their work, not just the work itself. It's also about my own struggles to find time for my work and make a living.
I want to know how to do my best work and still have time for other things. Can I do all the things I want to do, or do I have to choose? I don't have all the answers, but I've tried to show how other successful people have solved these problems.
I wanted to write about people's daily routines because it can be ordinary and not very exciting. But it's actually very important for being creative and productive. A good routine can help us make the most of our time and energy.
I was inspired to write this book because I was procrastinating and started looking at how other writers work. I found it interesting and thought it would be fun to share with others. I collected information from many sources and tried to make it easy to read and understand.

Howard became a paleontologist because of a change in his family's plans when he was six years old. His dad had to cancel their holiday to Spain because of high interest rates. Instead, they went to the beach in England and Howard found a fossil on the sand. He knew from a young age that he wanted to be a paleontologist. When he finished university, he decided he wanted to study fossils from a long, long time ago. He didn't want to study the big, famous dinosaurs, but the small, old creatures that lived a long time ago. He worked hard on his thesis and then had to wait to see if he could get a job at a university. He applied for a job at Tavistock College in London and was surprised when he got it. He was happy to have the job and could finally do the work he loved. 
Later, Howard had a problem when someone stole his notes for a lecture he was going to give. He was very upset and had to cancel the lecture. He met a colleague who told him about a new collection of fossils at the Natural History Museum in Nairobi. Howard was very interested and decided to go to the museum to study the fossils. He had to change his plans, but he was excited to have this new opportunity.

Charles Spence is a professor who studies how our senses work together to help us enjoy food. He thinks about things like the color, smell, and sound of food to make it taste better. He even eats unusual foods like ice cream made from bee larvae! 
He works with big food companies to help them make better food. He also helps famous chefs like Heston Blumenthal create new dishes that people will like. 
Did you know that the person who orders first at a restaurant usually likes their food the most? And did you know that people eat more food when they eat with friends? 
Charles Spence's lab is not fancy, but it's where he does his research. He works with cooks who can't fund their own research. He even helps big food companies make their food healthier by reducing salt and sugar. 
He's been working with Heston Blumenthal to create a dish that sounds like the sea. He also found out that music can affect how we taste food. For example, higher-pitched music makes food taste sweeter, and lower-pitched music makes it taste bitter. 
Charles Spence has a fun family. They like to have dinner parties with unusual foods and music. They even use tone generators and headphones to see how different sounds affect our taste.

Our brains are very busy. We have a lot of information coming at us from different places. We have to sort through it all and decide what's important and what we can ignore. We're doing more things on our own now. Thirty years ago, travel agents and salespeople helped us with things. Now we do them ourselves. We're doing many jobs at the same time, like checking our phones, watching TV, and working. But our brains are not good at doing many things at once. We think we're doing many things, but really we're just switching between them quickly. This is not good for our brains.
Our brains get tired and confused when we do many things at once. We might feel stressed and our brains might not work well. We can't focus on one thing for a long time. We get distracted easily. This is because our brains are not good at multitasking.
We also have a lot of emails and messages. We feel like we have to answer them, but it's hard to do that and get other things done. It's like trying to do too many things at once. This is making our brains tired and confused.

There is a chimpanzee in a Swedish zoo named Santino. He likes to break concrete into small pieces and throw them at visitors. Is he being mean? In some caves in the US, female bats help other bats who can't find the right way to have their babies. Are they being kind? 
A long time ago, people thought animals just did things without thinking about how they felt. But now, scientists are learning more about animal feelings and emotions. They are studying animals like bats, chimpanzees, rats, dolphins, and chickens. This has started a big debate. Can animals really think and feel like humans do? 
Some people think that animals can think and feel, and that we should treat them with kindness. Others think that animals are different from humans and that we should not compare them to us. 
There was an experiment with cows that had to open a gate to get food. The cows that opened the gate themselves seemed to be happy and excited. If cows like to solve problems, what does that mean for how we treat them? 
Some people think that we should stop eating meat because animals can think and feel. Others think that we should just learn more about animal thinking and feelings. 
It's hard to know for sure what animals think and feel, but it's an important question to think about.

'Critical thinking is a way to understand things better. We use it when we read or listen to something. Adrian West, a researcher, says that technology can help us learn, but it can also make it harder to think deeply. We are exposed to a lot of information, but it's not always good information. Sometimes, it's just someone's opinion or not true.
We are also reading less, and this might make us less good at thinking. A professor, Patricia Greenfield, says that we are reading less because we are spending more time watching TV and playing games. This can make it harder for us to think deeply.
Technology can be good or bad for thinking. For example, a computer game can help us think critically or make us think less. Reading on the internet can help us think, but following links can make it harder to think deeply.
The way we think has changed because of technology. Some people think that technology is bad for us, but others think it can be good. For example, some video games can help us learn and think better. They can teach us how to make decisions and think critically.
It's important to understand how technology affects our thinking and learning. We need to be careful and make sure we are using technology in a good way.'

Matthew Crawford is a writer and a motorcycle mechanic. He used to work in an office, but he didn't like it. He likes working with his hands. His first book was about why manual work is good. His latest book is about how to deal with modern life. He wrote it because he noticed that advertisements pop up on his phone when he's waiting. He thinks this is a problem because we're not in control of what we think about.
We're being asked to pay attention to many things at the same time, and it's hard to focus. People are becoming less social because they're too busy with their phones. Crawford thinks this is a problem because we're losing the ability to have real conversations with each other.
He's not the only one who thinks this is a problem. Many people are worried about how our brains are changing. We're more aware of the things we could be doing, but we're not doing them. Crawford thinks this is because technology has given us too many choices, and we're not good at making decisions.
He thinks we need to find ways to focus on one thing at a time. He gives examples of people who have to use their judgment in their jobs, like cooks, hockey players, and motorbike racers. They have to pay attention to what they're doing and work with others. Crawford thinks this is important because it helps us appreciate the world around us and makes us better at paying attention to others.
It's not about becoming a chef or a hockey player, but about finding a way to use our judgment. When we focus on one thing, we can focus on what's important.

'What do you do for a living?' This is a common question we ask each other. But for someone like me, who is a philosopher, it's a bit tricky. When I say I'm a philosopher, some people might think I'm trying to say I'm special or know more than others. But that's not true. Philosophers are just people who think deeply about life and try to understand the world.
Philosophers have a special job. We think about big questions like 'What is the meaning of life?' or 'Is it right or wrong to do something?' Sometimes people think philosophers are too serious or too smart, and that's why they don't understand us. But really, philosophy is about thinking about the things that matter in our daily lives.
Some people think philosophers are only interested in big books and complicated ideas. But that's not true. Philosophy is about looking at the things we do every day and asking if they are really what we want to do. It's about being honest with ourselves and thinking about what is important.
I like to call myself an 'ethicist' because I think about what is right and wrong. But I think that's not enough. I want to talk about more than just rules and laws. I want to talk about how we think and feel, and how we can make good choices.
Philosophy can help us see things in a new way. It can help us think about our choices and make better decisions. And that's something we can all do, not just philosophers.'

Food is important to many people. Philosophers have not always talked about food, but when they do, it is often just a way to explain other ideas. Epicurus, an ancient Greek philosopher, believed in enjoying life and avoiding pain. He talked about this in many areas of life, not just food and drink. Today, his name is often used to sell food and drinks.
Food is a big part of our lives. We eat with friends and family, and we share food with our community. Food comes from our history and culture. We learn about food from our families and friends.
Some people write about food and tell others what they like or dislike. But why do they get to decide what is good or bad? They are just better at describing what food tastes like. We should think about how our brains work when we taste food.
Food can be beautiful, like art or music. Some people think that food should be included in discussions about beauty, but it is hard to keep food around to look at or listen to again. Food is eaten and gone.
There are many questions about food, like what is good to eat and what is not. These questions show what we believe about the world. People who cook for a living have different responsibilities than people who cook at home. They have to think about their job and the food they make.
Food can help us understand other cultures. We can learn about new foods and make friends with people from different countries. This is important for building relationships and understanding each other.
I hope this simplified text is helpful for an A1 learner!

Rob Daviau is a game designer from the US. He thought that traditional board games were not exciting or challenging enough. He wanted to create a new kind of game where players could make decisions that would affect the game in the future. He created a new version of the game Risk, called Risk Legacy. This game was special because players could make changes to the board and cards during the game. The game would change over time, and players would have to make new decisions based on what happened before.
Daviau worked with another game designer to create a new game called Pandemic Legacy. This game was very popular. He then created a new game called SeaFall. This game is set in the time of sailing ships and players have to explore the world. Daviau wanted to make sure that the game was exciting and challenging, so he tested it with many people.
Some people thought that the legacy format would not be popular, but it was a big success. Many players loved the idea of making decisions that would affect the game over time. One player, Russell Chapman, said that it was like a new level of excitement and challenge. Another player, Ben Hogg, said that it was like watching a TV series - you don't watch the same episode twice, you want to see what happens next.
The legacy format is special because it combines elements of video games and TV shows. It allows players to have a story that unfolds over time. Daviau thinks that the idea will soon get old, but others think it will continue to be popular.

One night, an octopus named Inky escaped from his tank at a special place called the National Aquarium in New Zealand. He crawled across the floor and went into a small pipe that led to the ocean. This is a fun story that people liked to share online.
We like to imagine that animals are like us. This is called anthropomorphism. Octopuses are very smart, but they look very different from us. They can open jars, recognize faces, and even play. Some people think it's not good to imagine animals are like us, but Dr. de Waal, a scientist who studies animals, says it's actually the opposite. He thinks we don't want to believe that animals are smart like us.
Dr. de Waal looked at many studies about animal intelligence. He found that animals can do many things that we thought were only possible for humans. They can think about the past and the future, feel empathy, and understand what others are thinking. Animals are smarter than we thought.
A long time ago, people thought animals were smart and could even be put on trial for crimes. But in the 20th century, scientists started to think that animals were just machines that responded to rewards and punishments. This changed how people thought about animal intelligence. Now, Dr. de Waal thinks we are starting to understand that animals are intelligent in their own way.
The best way to test animal intelligence is to use tasks that are easy for them. For example, squirrels are great at remembering where they hide their nuts. If an octopus were to test human intelligence, it might ask us to change the color of our skin. We would probably fail!
Dr. de Waal is not sure if Inky really found a way to get to the ocean. But he thinks it's good that people are talking about animal intelligence. He even did an experiment with monkeys to see if they can feel envy. The monkeys got upset when they saw their friends getting better treats. The experiment was published in a scientific journal, but a short video clip really made people understand the results.

Robots are changing the way we work and live. They are becoming more common in many industries, not just in factories. Experts think that soon, robots will be used in many areas, and people's jobs will change. Some people think that robots will take over most jobs, but many people also think that their jobs will stay the same.
A company in Australia has made a robot that can lay bricks faster than humans. A robot in a supermarket checks that the shelves are full and the prices are correct. Some people think that robots will create new jobs for people who can fix and program them. Others worry that robots will make it hard for people to work with each other.
A expert on robots, Dr. Zhang, says that robots will change the way we work. He thinks that in a few years, many robots will be able to work with each other and with humans. He also thinks that some companies will need a special person to be in charge of robots. Dr. Zhang says that people who work with robots will need new skills.
In the future, robots will be used in our homes and will interact with us in new ways. This will be a big change, and we will need to make sure that it is safe and private. Education is important to help us understand and prepare for the changes that robots will bring.

Some people like to climb mountains. A long time ago, a man named George Mallory said that he wanted to climb Mount Everest because "it's there". This answer might inspire some people to try new things. Climbing can be fun and exciting, but it can also be very difficult and dangerous.
There are different ways to climb, and some people like to do it in a special way. For example, some people like to climb small rocks, while others like to climb big mountains. The way you climb depends on the type of climb you are doing.
Some people like to climb because it makes them feel free. But climbing can also be very confining, especially when you are stuck in a tent during a storm.
Some people think that climbing is in our nature. We are meant to challenge ourselves and take risks. Climbing can also help us develop good qualities like courage and respect for nature.
Climbers who do not use special equipment or help from others have to be very committed to their goal. This can make their achievements more special.
Climbing can also be a way to be in the moment and focus on the present. It's like a kind of meditation. Some people even think that climbing can help us find inner peace, just like the teachings of Zen philosophy.
When people ask why we climb, we can answer that it's because it's fun, it's a challenge, and it helps us grow as people.

Alfred Brendel was a famous pianist. He played classical music for many years. He was a serious person, but he had a playful side too. He liked to teach, but he didn't teach many students. One day, a young boy named Kit Armstrong came to one of his concerts. Kit was 14 years old and played the piano very well. Brendel was surprised and impressed by Kit's talent. He started teaching Kit, and Kit learned a lot from him.
Kit is a hard worker. He practices every day and learns new things. He likes to play different sports, like tennis, and learn new languages. He also writes music and composes his own songs. Brendel is proud of Kit's progress. He says Kit has a great memory and can play music by ear. He is also very good at listening to his own playing and to Brendel's advice.
Brendel is happy to see Kit becoming a good pianist. He doesn't want people to expect too much from Kit too soon. He wants Kit to take his time and practice more. Brendel is 80 years old now, and he is happy to be retired. He still thinks about music and wants to play more, but his body doesn't allow him to. He is happy to have taught Kit and to see him become a good pianist.

When I was little, I thought gardens were always beautiful and special. My grandfather's garden was near a river and went down to the water. You couldn't reach the river, but you could hear the water and the birds singing in the trees. I thought all gardens were like this - a place to escape and be alone. My grandfather's garden wasn't special, but it was nice. He didn't have a big greenhouse like some of his neighbors. They used old windows to make theirs.
My father was a quiet person, but he liked to make people laugh. He had funny phrases he liked to use. He wasn't very ambitious and didn't like his job as a plumber. He was good at fixing things around the house, though.
We moved to a new house only once when I was a child. My mother liked to change the furniture, so it was always different. We got a piano once, but I was scared of it. It was too big and fancy. My sister got lessons, but I never got to play it.
I liked the river best. I could go there with my imagination and pretend I was in a different world. I would take a fishing net and walk along the riverbank, looking for fish. Sometimes I would take off my shoes and wade into the water.
I didn't like school very much, but my father said there was a job available for a gardener in the Parks Department. He thought I might like it. I like to think that deep down, he wanted me to be happy and good at something.

Lawrence MacEwen lives on a small island called Muck in Scotland. I visit him and we go outside to look around. The wind is strong and it's hard to stand up. But Lawrence is comfortable because he loves his island. He shows me the other islands nearby. He says, "That one is called Eigg and the other one is called Rum. Rum gets a lot more rain than we do."
We go down the hill to move his sheep. Lawrence tells me about the island. It's a special place with lots of grass and geese. The MacEwens have lived here for 3,000 years.
The sheepdog, Tie, is not doing a good job. He's supposed to circle around the sheep, but he's going straight through them. Lawrence is not happy. Tie looks sad.
The MacEwens own most of the island. Lawrence's wife, Jenny, helps him with the farm. Their son, Colin, runs the cottages, and their daughter, Mary, runs a hotel with her husband, Toby. They like that their boys can play outside and sail boats in the summer.
Life on the island can be hard. Sometimes there's no electricity, so we have to use torches. There's no mobile phone signal, so we can't use our phones. But we like it here.
One day, some musicians come to the island and play music in the tearoom. Everyone loves it. That night, Lawrence tells me how he met his wife, Jenny. He says her father bought a farm on another island without looking at it, and Jenny was sent to manage it. She didn't know much about farming, but she was good at typing.
I go to bed and wake up to more rain. But I eat well because all the food comes from the island. I go to the fisherman, Sandy, to get fresh fish and bring it back to Mary at the hotel. We eat it for dinner. The next day, I take the ferry to my next island. I was worried that the ferry might not come because of the bad weather, but it did. I'm glad to be leaving, but I also like it here.

The video game industry is growing. It used to be hard to get a job in this industry because people thought it was just for young people who liked playing games. But now, experts say it's a serious job. To get into this industry, you need to be good at making games. You don't need a degree in computer science, but you do need to make games. It's like any other creative job - you need to be good at what you do.
Jim Donelly, a person who writes about games, says it's hard to get a job in a big company, but there are still opportunities. You can start by making games on your own and then try to get a job. Another expert, John Field, says that to be successful in this industry, you need to be good at making games, have the right skills, and be creative. He also says that having a good course or training can help.
To get ahead in this industry, you need to network and make connections. This means meeting other people who work in the industry and learning from them. The video game industry is growing and becoming more popular. More and more people are playing games on their phones and computers. John thinks that this is a good thing because it means there are more opportunities for people who want to work in the industry.

'I love playing football. My dad encouraged me to play when I was a kid. I'm glad he did. I had a friend who didn't like playing because his dad was too pushy. He would say, "You can't do this, you can't do that." My friend stopped playing and never played again. I'm happy that didn't happen to me.
When I score a goal, people say it's just luck, but it's not. I practiced a lot when I was a kid. You have to practice to be good at something. Even the best players in the world had to practice a lot.
I played many sports at school, like rounders and basketball. Football was my favorite. I want my son to enjoy learning new things too. We're already reading books to him, even though he's too young to sit still.
When I started playing professionally, our manager didn't make a big deal about it. We knew we had to work hard. We lost our first game, but we didn't give up. I rely on my friends and family. Sometimes, having a lot of money can be a problem. I help my parents, but they don't want to be dependent on me. After I stop playing, I want to take a break and do things I haven't had time for. I want to go skiing, but I can't do that now because I need to be careful not to get hurt.'

We were living at Reef Point because of Sam Carter. He was my father's friend in Los Angeles. My father was having trouble writing because he didn't like Los Angeles. Sam found a cheap place for us to live. The beach at Reef Point was usually empty because it was hard to get to. But in the summer, people started coming. My father was working hard to write a script. I would go to the beach with my dog, Rusty. Rusty was a friendly dog who liked to dig and swim. One day, my father went to Los Angeles to give his script to the people who wanted it. Rusty and I stayed at the beach and watched the surfers. They were very good at surfing. One surfer, a girl, caught my eye. She was very good at surfing too. She asked me why I wasn't surfing and I said I didn't have a surfboard. She said I could buy one, but I didn't have money. She asked me where I was from and what my father did. I told her my father was a writer and he was writing a script. She knew his book, "Tall as the Morning". She was very interested in my father's book.

Violet Hetherington was standing in a long line at the dock in Southampton. She was waiting to get on a ship called the Queen Caroline. She was worried because she was late and didn't know what to do. Her friend Annie had told her to get to the dock late, but this time it wasn't a good idea. 
There was a problem with the computer system, and the line wasn't moving. People were getting angry and frustrated. Violet was feeling anxious and thought about leaving. She also realized she had lost her phone, which was very annoying. 
She couldn't call her son Harry to ask him to help her find her phone because his number was on her lost phone. She asked a kind couple behind her if she could use their phone to call Harry. 
Finally, the line started moving, and Violet got to the front. She gave her papers to the staff and went on the ship. The ship's lobby was big and fancy, with shiny wood and lots of mirrors. Violet was squished in the elevator with many other people, but at last she reached her room. She was relieved to see that it had a balcony, just like she had asked for. She had been worried about this, and now she could relax.

John Maloof bought a box of old photo negatives at an auction. He was looking for pictures to use in a book about a neighborhood in Chicago. Instead, he found 30,000 photos taken by a photographer named Vivian Maier. She was a street photographer who took pictures of people, children, and everyday life.
John has many of Vivian's cameras, film, and photos at his home. He and his friend Anthony are trying to learn more about Vivian's life. They talked to people who knew her and looked at her photos.
Vivian was born in New York and grew up in France. She came to Chicago to work as a nanny. She always carried a camera with her and took pictures of everything. She liked to wear big coats and hats.
Vivian was a private person, but she wasn't afraid to take pictures of people on the street. She was very good at taking pictures and followed her dreams. Her pictures are very special because she didn't take them for money.
John is very happy to have Vivian's photos and wants to share them with the world. He thinks she is an important photographer and wants to put her name in the history books.

Eleanor Catton is a young writer. She wrote a big book called The Luminaries. It's a murder mystery set in New Zealand a long time ago. The story is very complicated. Eleanor wanted to give each of the 20 main characters a big part in the story.
I met Eleanor in the UK. She was very calm, even though she was in the middle of a big publicity storm. She told me a funny story about being stopped at the airport and asked to show her passport. She showed the official her book and said it was a book about a mystery. The official asked what it was about, and Eleanor said it was hard to explain.
Eleanor said she didn't plan the book's structure beforehand. She just wrote and saw where it took her. She wanted to make the book fun to read and exciting. She likes writing about New Zealand and its landscape. She said that being in a different place can change her imagination.
Eleanor is happy to be successful at a young age. She said it's nice to have people in her home country feel proud of her. She's not sure if she'll write another book like this one, but she's happy to keep writing.

Jonny Kinkead likes to make things with his hands. When he was a boy, he used to play with a guitar in his dad's garage. Now, he makes his own guitars by hand. He loves making guitars because he can create a beautiful sound with just two pieces of wood.
Jonny learned to play the guitar when he was 11. He then wanted to learn the bass guitar. Instead of buying one, he decided to make his own. He studied guitars and learned how to use different types of wood to make different sounds.
Jonny and his brothers used to make model boats and airplanes when they were young. Their dad taught them how to use tools like saws and chisels. Jonny also fixed and customized instruments for his friends.
After school, Jonny studied architecture at university. But he didn't like it and dropped out. He realized that he wanted to make guitars, not buildings. He thought that building guitars was like sculpting, but instead of making art, he was making something people could use.
Jonny started making guitars for a living. At first, he sold them for the cost of the materials. But as he became famous for making good guitars, he could charge more money. Now, he still makes only a few guitars a year, which isn't very much money. He says that he's still "scratching a living".
Jonny thinks that it's easier for new guitar-makers today because people now know that UK-made guitars are good. He says that you can learn by taking classes, but you also need to try things and make mistakes to get better.

Talking about the weather is a common way to start a conversation in English. Many people think that English people love talking about the weather because it's interesting. But, it's not really about the weather. It's a way to make conversation and be friendly. 
For example, when we say "Nice day, isn't it?" or "Ooh, isn't it cold?", we're not really asking about the weather. We're just saying hello or trying to make conversation. This is like when monkeys and apes groom each other to be friendly. 
We only talk about the weather in certain situations. We might say something about the weather when we meet someone, to start a conversation. We might also talk about the weather when we're not sure what else to say. This can make it seem like we talk about the weather all the time. But, really, it's just a way to be friendly and make conversation.

Alice Leader is a teacher who loves teaching children. She took her students on a trip to Hadrian's Wall in Britain. The wall was built by the Romans a long time ago. Alice's students were very interested in the wall, but they wanted to know why it was built. Alice couldn't find a good book to help her explain it, so she decided to write one herself.
Alice used to teach for 31 years, but then she retired and started writing books. She wrote her first book about a Roman couple and their baby. Her husband, Zachary Leader, is a good editor and helped her make the book better.
Alice wants to write books that are fun and interesting for children. She thinks that many books for children are either too sad or too fantastical. She wants to write books that are just right for kids. She loves teaching and writing because it's a way for her to stay connected with children.

Two brothers, Jonny and Alistair Brownlee, are famous for being good at triathlons. They decided to take part in a special race to help raise money for charity. The race was between a car and a bike. Jonny drove the car, and Alistair rode a mountain bike. They started at a beautiful lake and had to finish at the highest road in Yorkshire.
Jonny was excited to drive, but Alistair was confident because he knew his brother's driving skills. Alistair wore special clothes to keep warm because it was cold. The race began, and they went their separate ways. Jonny had to drive on the road, while Alistair rode his bike through the countryside.
The road was not easy for Jonny. He had to stop because of a big tractor. Alistair had a hard time too. He had to carry his bike up a big hill. But he didn't give up. He kept going and finally reached the top.
Then, he rode down the hill and rode to the finish line. Jonny was still driving. He had to go through a small village and then a stream. He was getting close to the finish line. Alistair was already there, waiting. He was happy to have won.
Jonny was disappointed, but he was proud of his brother. He said, "Well done, Alistair. I'm gutted."

When I play tennis on Centre Court at Wimbledon, I feel a strange quietness. The ball bounces softly on the grass, and I hear the sound of my own shots. The grass is trimmed, the stadium is old, and the players wear white clothes. The crowd is quiet too. This quiet helps me focus on the game. 
What I struggle with most in a tennis match is to forget everything and just think about the game. The quiet of Centre Court helps me do that. Sometimes, when a point is finished, the crowd cheers and claps. I hear it, but it feels far away. I'm so focused that I don't think about the millions of people watching me on TV.
I always dreamed of playing at Wimbledon. My coach, my uncle Toni, told me it was the biggest tournament. When I was 14, I thought about playing there and winning. Before 2008, I played and lost twice to Roger Federer. Losing is hard, but losing when you have a chance is even harder. I was very sad after my loss in 2007. I cried for a long time. My coach told me not to cry and that there would be more chances.
I want to make the most of my time as a tennis player. Every moment counts, and some moments are more important than others. I didn't want to miss another chance like that. This year, 2008, I was more focused. I knew I could win. The night before the final, we didn't talk about the match at dinner. I was already thinking about the game in my head. From now on, I wanted to keep my thoughts to myself.

'A long time ago, a young English woman named Jane Goodall went to Africa. She was very excited to be there. She wanted to learn about animals and help them. Jane spent most of her life in Africa and became famous for her work with chimpanzees. She wrote many books and made TV shows about her discoveries.
Before Jane's work, people didn't know much about chimpanzees. They thought they were just wild animals that didn't care about each other. But Jane showed that chimpanzees are smart, social, and emotional, just like humans. They use tools, eat meat, and have their own families.
Jane's work was very important. She helped us understand animals better and changed the way we think about ourselves. She was a pioneer in her field and is still famous today. Even as a little girl, Jane was curious and loved animals. When she was five years old, she snuck into a henhouse to see how hens lay eggs. This might have been the start of her career as a biologist.'

Shirley Ford is a voice actor. She can talk like many people, like a boy, a tired mom, and even an alien! She has done many voiceovers for TV and videos. She talks about what it takes to do voiceovers. "It's not just about making funny voices," she says. "You have to make the script come alive for people who can't see you."
Shirley started acting when she was in school. She did some singing for TV commercials. One day, she tried out for a cartoon and got a big part! She realized she was good at doing voices and decided to focus on voiceover work.
Shirley has done many jobs, from educational videos to ads for vacuum cleaners. She has to make her voice sound happy and excited, even when she's not really excited about the product. She says that smiling while she talks helps her sound friendly and cheerful.
It's hard to get work as a voice actor, but Shirley has been successful. She thinks it's because she's worked hard and hasn't given up. She recommends attending special workshops and having a passion for voices.
Shirley's children are used to hearing her talk in different voices because she gets into character so much. She loves being a voice actor and feels lucky to have found a job she enjoys.

Many people ask me how I became a cartoonist. It's a dream job that some people have when they are young, like being a racing car driver. But most people grow up and choose more realistic jobs, like being a lawyer or a car parts maker. It seems silly to think that you can make a living by drawing simple pictures, but some people do it. 
I became a cartoonist because I loved drawing and making comics when I was a child. I studied graphic design in college and then showed my illustrations to different companies. I was lucky to find a newspaper that wanted my cartoons. I started drawing and soon I was making enough money to support myself.
To become a cartoonist, you don't need a university degree, a lot of money, or even be very good at drawing. You just need your brain, your hands, and something to draw with. But it's not an easy job. You need to be very good at your work and have a lot of patience.
I have done many different types of cartoons, like political cartoons, comic strips, and comic books. I have also been a writer, a caricaturist, and a designer. I don't say no to any job because you can learn a lot from any work you do. It's also important to be smart, read a lot, and be curious about the world.
Most cartoonists today have to sell their own work. They need to be good at business too. I have seen many cartoonists who are not very good at drawing but are very good at business do well. It's important to not worry too much about someone stealing your ideas. You can protect your work by putting a 'c' for 'copyright' on it.
It's more likely that no one will be interested in your work, but if someone does steal it and it becomes popular, it can be a good thing!

Twenty years ago, I moved to a new house. I decided to throw away some old things, including an electric guitar my dad gave me for my 16th birthday. I felt bad about getting rid of it, but I did it anyway. Then, a young man saw me throwing it away and asked if he could have it. I said yes, and we parted ways.
Later, I got an email from a man named Keith. He said he had my guitar and wanted to sell it back to me. He found my name on a sticker on the guitar. I was very happy to get my guitar back. My dad used to put stickers with my name on everything I had, even my guitar.
When I was a teenager, my parents wanted me to play the classical guitar. But I didn't like it, so I started playing the electric guitar instead. It was fun, but I didn't play it much.
Recently, Keith sent me the guitar, and I was very happy to see it again. When I picked it up, I remembered my birthday when my parents gave it to me. It felt smooth and comfortable in my hands. I started playing it, and my fingers knew what to do. I even felt the special pain of pressing the strings to play a chord.
The electric guitar is a fun instrument, but it's not good for playing alone. Maybe I'll start a band with my son, who plays the saxophone. We could call ourselves "The Regainers"!

There's a lot of talk about sleep now. When I wrote a book about people who can't sleep, I felt like I was warning people about the dangers of not sleeping enough. Sleep is very important for our minds, bodies, and moods. People who have trouble sleeping know how important it is.
But what about dreams? We don't hear much about dreams. When we wake up early, we often cut off the last hour or two of sleep. This is the stage of sleep where we have our most vivid dreams. A good sleeper spends about a quarter of their sleep time dreaming. When we don't get enough sleep, our brains make up for it by having more dreams the next night.
Some scientists think dreams are important. They used to think that dreams helped us understand our minds, but now they think they might be more important for our brains. A study found that people who are creative, like actors and writers, have better memories of their dreams. This makes sense because they use their dreams to help them come up with new ideas.
But dreams are not just for artists. We all need to be creative in our daily lives. We need to think clearly and come up with new ideas. Dreams can help us do this. Even a bad dream can help us think more clearly. When I wake up from a good dream, I can write very easily. My words and ideas come quickly and easily. We all need to dream to be able to think clearly and be creative.

Twenty years ago, Susie Ray left London to live in a small town by the sea. When you visit her studio, you'll see many empty frames on the walls. There are also pictures of her two daughters smiling at you. Susie is a very good artist. She can copy famous paintings from a long time ago. People think her copies are the real thing! She has been doing this for 30 years. Susie has copied paintings by famous artists like Renoir, Monet, and Van Gogh.
Susie's copies are very good because she takes her time. She makes sure they look like the original paintings. Some people buy her copies for a few hundred pounds to 12,000, depending on how long she takes to finish it. Susie won't say who her clients are, but they are galleries and collectors. Some collectors like to show off their art to their friends. Susie says it's okay if they do this, but she doesn't want to pretend her copies are the real thing.
Susie started as an illustrator for a botanical garden. She drew pictures of plants for a long time. This helped her learn to be very accurate. She says this was good training for what she does now. She also learned to draw plants and make perfect copies of old paintings. Susie now specializes in copying French impressionist paintings. She likes the artists Manet, Cezanne, and Degas.
Some people might think it's strange that Susie doesn't make her own paintings. They might think art is about expressing yourself. But Susie says she has spent years learning and practicing. She makes a good living doing what she does. She has tried making her own paintings, but they didn't turn out as well as her copies. Maybe it's like eating food cooked by a good chef after eating plain bread and water for a long time. The thing about Susie is that she is very good at what she does.

Ellen MacArthur loves the sea. She used to sail around the world alone and was very good at it. She spent 94 days on her boat, Kingfisher, without stopping. She had to plan everything carefully, like how much food she would need. She showed me her boat and told me how she took care of it because her life depended on it.
After she stopped sailing, Ellen realized that the world is like a small boat. We use too many things and don't take care of them. She saw this when she visited an island where there were old whaling stations. She thought it was sad that people took everything they wanted and then left.
Ellen now wants to help people take care of the planet. She thinks we should use things again instead of throwing them away. She visits factories and talks to important people about using less energy and water. She started a charity to help young people think about how to make the world a better place.
Ellen misses sailing, but she thinks this new work is more important. She wants to use her voice to help make a difference. She says, "I love learning new things and talking to people about how we can make the world a better place."

Jordan Romero is a 13-year-old boy who wants to climb Mount Everest. If he succeeds, he might become very famous. He wants to inspire other kids to go outside and be active. Jordan's parents, Paul and Karen, will help him on his climb. They are a team and want to climb all the highest mountains on each continent. Jordan has already climbed five of them and might finish all seven before he's 18.
Some people think it's not a good idea for a 13-year-old to climb Mount Everest. They think he might not be strong enough or experienced enough. Jordan's parents have thought about these worries, but they believe their own experience will help keep him safe. They also think Jordan is growing up and getting stronger.
Jordan's father, Paul, says that this project isn't just about him being proud of his son. They thought about doing it later, but then they said, "Why not now?" They talk to Jordan regularly to make sure he still wants to do it.
Jordan says he likes the challenge of climbing mountains. He just focuses on achieving his goal. Some people think that too many people are only doing things to be famous, but Jordan's parents say that if he wants to inspire others, he needs to be famous. So, Jordan has to do things like blogging and talking to the media.
If Jordan gets tired of climbing and wants to play basketball instead, his parents will stop the project and go to the gym with him.

'When you see a teenager with an MP3 player, it's likely they're listening to pop music, not classical music. Most people know many pop groups, but few know who Brahms was. I'm studying music, but my friends and I don't know much about classical music. People don't buy many classical music recordings. Only 3% of concert tickets sold last year were for classical music. Why don't teenagers like classical music? It's hard to understand because classical music is slow and has many changes in mood. Teenagers like to talk fast, play fast, and think fast. Pop music is easy to listen to and has simple structures. Classical music needs time and attention. Pop music is about things that teenagers care about. We listen to music differently now. We can find any music on the internet. We don't often hear classical music. My teacher says classical concert audiences are growing, but I think most of those people are not teenagers. When I play classical music with my friends, we see mostly old people. Some people think schools are the problem, but many kids enjoy playing classical music in school. They like it when they play, but they don't like listening to it otherwise. We like pop music when we relax.'

Bonnie Wyndham got out of her mom's car and looked at Almonside School. She said, "I'll make you sorry I came here." Her mom was getting out of the other door, so she didn't hear her. Bonnie's mom knew how she felt.
Bonnie's mom looked around. Almonside School was a little confusing because it was hidden among the trees. But then she saw signs that said "Science block", "gymnasium", and "riding centre". Bonnie saw the riding centre and got interested. Her mom said, "Let's go this way."
Bonnie followed her mom to the headmaster's office. Her mom talked to the headmaster while Bonnie waited outside. Then Bonnie got up and said, "Why should I just sit here?" She thought to herself, "I'll get in trouble soon anyway, so I might as well do what I want." She left the office and went to the riding centre.
The riding centre had nice old buildings and a big place for indoor riding. Bonnie looked around, but there was no one there. She liked horses and was careful not to disturb them. The horses were very well taken care of.
Bonnie saw a little pony and said, "Hello, little one." Then she saw a brown horse with a touch of white. She liked him and said, "You're the best horse here!" She stroked his neck and said, "I think we've met before. I rode you in my dreams and we won a big competition." The horse's name was Maverick.
Bonnie wanted to ride Maverick, so she looked for a saddle and bridle. She found them and put them on Maverick. She felt like a queen on the horse. She remembered her nickname at her old school was "Queen Bee" and laughed.
Bonnie rode Maverick around the paddock. She felt happy and free. She said, "You're the best horse I've ever ridden, Maverick. I think we could be great friends."

I know Cody Simpson, a 15-year-old boy from Australia. He is very good at singing and has already made many successful songs. But how did he become a famous singer? Cody started playing the guitar when he was six years old and wrote his first songs when he was seven. He loved swimming and surfing, but then he started posting videos of himself singing online. People liked his videos very much and asked for more. Cody decided to keep making videos and soon record labels wanted to work with him. He had to choose between swimming and singing. He chose singing and moved to the United States with his family. It was a big change, but he is happy he made the decision. Cody's family is very important to him, and they support him in everything he does. Sometimes Cody worries about how his decision might affect his little brother and sister, but his family is always there to help him. Cody says that success comes from being brave and saying "yes" to new opportunities. He never thought he would be singing in front of so many people, but he is grateful for this chance.

I woke up early and looked out of my bedroom window. I saw a big crack in the river ice. The sun was shining on it. I had helped put up sandbags along the river to stop the buildings from flooding. My back hurt from lifting them. My grandfather didn't say thank you. He never does.
I saw a boy on the other side of the river. He was trying to stand on the ice. I didn't know him. I put on my special clothes for kayaking and grabbed my jacket. I checked my pocket for a special chain my grandfather gave me. It's very special because only a few people know about it.
I went to the kitchen to get something to eat. My mom said, "Good morning, Rex. You're up early today. Be careful." I said, "Thanks, Mom." Then I saw my grandfather. He was grumpy and asked where I was going. I told him I was going kayaking. He said, "What's the point of training? You didn't win the competition." I didn't say anything. He went to the bathroom and my mom came out and smiled at me. She said, "Don't mind him. He's not feeling well." I nodded and went outside.
I love my grandfather, but he can be mean sometimes. When I was little, he was my hero. He showed me pictures of his adventures and I wanted to be like him. Now, I have my own adventures and I'm working hard to make them happen. My mom said, "You're very determined, Rex. Have a good session." I smiled and went outside to the boathouse.

Mum took Jess to the study. There was a painting on the table. It was one of Grandpa's, but it was different from his other paintings. Mum asked Jess if she knew anything about it. Jess said she had never seen it before.
The painting showed a river, but it was not a real river. The riverbank was very small and hard to see. There were no animals, no birds, and no people. The picture was strange and beautiful. Jess felt drawn to it.
Mum said the painting had a name. Jess read it out loud: "River Boy". She didn't understand why the name was important. Mum said maybe Grandpa would add a boy to the painting later.
Jess looked at Mum. "There is no boy," she said. Mum said it was strange that Grandpa gave the painting a name. Jess knew what Grandpa would say: that the artist doesn't explain their paintings because each one has its own special meaning.
Mum asked Jess if she knew something about the painting because she inspired Grandpa. Jess said she didn't inspire him. Grandpa was a good painter and didn't need help.

I woke up this morning and accidentally cut a hole in my bedroom carpet. I didn't mean to do it. I was trying to fit a special cabinet into a corner, but it didn't fit. The cabinet was given to me by my grandmother. It's a small, white cabinet with flowers on it and has glass doors. I keep my shells and stones in it.
My bedroom is small and shaped like a wedge of cheese. I have a bed in one corner and a wardrobe in the other. I tried to fit the cabinet into the space between the roof and the floor, but it was too tall. Then I thought, "Why not cut a hole in the carpet?" I thought it was a good idea at the time, but now I'm not so sure.
My dad says we should think outside the box. He would be proud of me for thinking of a creative solution. But now I'm not so happy about the hole in the carpet.

"The TV show 'The Borrowers' is about a family of tiny people who live in a house. They take things from the big people who live there. I directed the TV show. It was hard to make it because people who love the book have strong ideas about how it should be. I used the drawings from the book to help me. The author wanted the show to be from the tiny people's point of view, not from the big people's. This made filming more difficult.
The tiny people are 10 times smaller than the big people. So, when we filmed them walking or doing things, we had to be 10 times farther away. When we filmed the big people's things, the crew had to crawl on the ground and film from low down. We never raised the camera high except for some special shots.
It was hard to get the shadows right when we combined the tiny people with the big people's surroundings. We developed a special way to do it. After the show was finished, a famous director, George Lucas, called me to ask how we did it.
The only big set we built was the tiny people's home under the floorboards. It was filled with big things to make the actors look small. The actors had to carry big things like scissors and coins. Sometimes we had to stop filming because it was too funny.
In one scene, the tiny people go down a drain. The actors had to be swept down a tunnel with water and they said it was very scary. They didn't have to act much because they were really scared!
I wanted the costumes to be right. I made them out of heavy material so they looked like doll clothes. This made it hard for the actors to move around. They couldn't sit down or take off their clothes because they were sewn in.
The weather was very hot during filming. I think the actors didn't thank me for the costumes!
Most of the scenes were filmed with the actors separated from their surroundings. We filmed them in front of a blue screen on an empty set. It was hard for them to react to things that weren't there. I drew pictures of each scene myself to show the actors what it should look like. I drew 2,000 pictures in the end! The budget didn't allow for special effects studios, so I worked at night for three months. We had to work fast and make mistakes sometimes. But it all worked out in the end, and I think the show was successful in showing the magic of the books."

My mom drops me off at my new school, Palm Grove High School. She looks around nervously. She doesn't want people to know who I am. I tell her everything will be okay. She kisses me and leaves. I'm alone now. I want to meet normal kids, not famous people. My dad is a famous musician, but I want to be normal. I go to the school office and get my schedule. My name is Desert McGraw. The secretary types it on her computer. She gives me my schedule. I have English class first period. I like English. I'll be late, but I studied the map so I can find my way.
When I get to class, the teacher is already taking roll. I slip in and sit down. The girl next to me smiles. She likes my shoes. I say thank you. The teacher asks for my name, and I say it's Desert McGraw. She smiles and introduces herself. We get our course outlines and can talk to each other. My new friend asks why I moved here. I say my dad had to move for work. She asks what he does, and I say he's an artist. That's a lie, but it's okay. I just want to be normal for a little while.

Many American teenage girls are expected to be good students, work part-time, and help others. They must do well in school and have a job. Teenagers can't just go to school and do nothing. They must work hard and be good at everything. Some people think that teenagers are lazy and only care about themselves. But this is not true.
Teenagers have a lot of work to do. They have homework, tests, and other activities. They also have jobs and help at home. They must also have a social life. It's hard for them to have time for everything.
Some people think that teenagers spend too much time on their phones. But many teenagers use their phones to help them with their work and to stay in touch with their families. They can do their homework anywhere and anytime.
Teenagers often don't get enough sleep. They might sleep only 6-7 hours a night. This can make them tired and grumpy. Some teenagers even fall asleep in school because they are so tired.
Despite all their work and responsibilities, many teenagers still find time to help others. They volunteer and do things to make their community better. They are not selfish and only think about themselves. They care about others and want to make a difference.
In the future, people might think differently about teenagers. They might see that they are not lazy or selfish, but hardworking and caring people who make a difference in the world.

There is a special group of teenagers who live near a town called Bishop in the US. They like to send balloons to space. They do this to learn about science and have an adventure. One weekend, I went to join them. They were going to send a balloon to the edge of space to see shooting stars. Shooting stars happen when small rocks or pieces of metal from space enter the Earth's atmosphere and make a bright trail.
The teenagers prepared the balloon by putting a special box on the bottom. Inside the box, they put a camera, a tool to measure how high the balloon was, and a thermometer to measure the temperature. They also put two GPS trackers on the outside so they could find the box later.
They used a special gas to make the balloon get bigger and bigger. It took a long time to get the gas, but it was worth it. When it was time to send the balloon, they counted down and let it go. The balloon went up, up, up, and some of the teenagers followed it with flashlights to see where it went.
After the balloon disappeared, the teenagers went home, but some stayed to look for shooting stars. They lay on blankets on the side of a mountain and looked at the very clear sky. It was hard to believe they were only a few hours from a big city.
The next day, the teenagers went to find the box using the GPS trackers. It took them a long time to get to it, but it was an adventure. The box was in a special place, high on a rock near a waterfall. They didn't find any shooting stars, but they learned a lot about science and had a great story to tell.

Chloe Morgan didn't like science when she was young. But then she saw an article about dinosaurs and it changed everything. She wanted to learn more.
Chloe's brother was into dinosaurs when he was young, but she didn't share his interest. One day, she helped him with a science project and saw an article about dinosaurs. It was amazing! She wanted to learn more.
Chloe met a famous palaeontologist, Matt Cornelius, who was nice and easy to talk to. He was patient and listened to her questions. This made her feel comfortable.
People often think palaeontologists are weird or not good with people. But Chloe's job is not like that. She digs up dinosaur bones, studies them in the lab, and writes about them. She also talks to people about science.
Chloe likes to explain science to others, especially children. She thinks it's important to tell them about all kinds of science, not just dinosaurs. Dinosaurs can help kids learn about the natural world and other sciences.
Chloe was in a TV show about dinosaurs called "Walking with Dinosaurs". She helped make sure the dinosaurs looked right. She's happy that people of all ages watched the show and learned about dinosaurs.
Chloe thinks people like dinosaurs because they're exciting and new. We can learn a lot from them. Dinosaurs take us back in time and remind us that there's still a lot to discover.

When you go on a car trip with your family, you know you're not there yet, even when you ask 'Are we there yet?' many times. When you finally get there, it's not 'there' anymore, it's 'here'. So, you should ask 'Are we here yet?' instead. Mums and dads get tired of answering 'Are we there yet?' many times. They wish they could relax and enjoy the trip. 
Imagine being in the back seat, watching movies, listening to music, or playing with puzzles while looking out the window at the nice views. The person sitting next to you, usually your mum or dad, helps you with things like getting you a drink or adjusting the radio. 
Sometimes, someone in the back seat does something naughty, like putting their foot on your side of the seat. This can start a fight. The driver and co-pilot try to stop the fight and tell the naughty person to stay in their own seat. 
After a while, the car ride gets calm again, and you might even get to read a book. But then, you might feel a cold breeze on your arm. This is because your sibling is blowing air on you on purpose. You get angry and yell at them. The grown-ups try to make you stop fighting and stay in your seat. 
Dad has a trick to make the kids quiet. He says, 'We're there!' and we get out of the car. But sometimes, you can tell when you're really 'there' because the grown-ups run away from the kids as fast as they can. So, if the grown-ups are still near, the answer is 'no, you're not there yet.'

John and Zuzi Morgan have a special caf in Oxford where people can play board games and have a cup of coffee and cake. They want people to have fun and want to come back again. Zuzi says they wanted to create a place where people can be together, not just staring at their phones. They like games that are not too complicated and are fun for everyone.
The games they play are called 'Eurogames'. They are about things like farming and building. The first game was called The Settlers of Catan. Players work together and trade things with each other. This makes everyone feel included and excited.
Another game, Pandemic, is about working together to solve problems. The designer, Matt Leacock, was inspired by a game called Lord of the Rings. He wanted to create a game that would make everyone feel good, whether they won or lost.
Matt Leacock loves board games because he was frustrated with them when he was a child. He would try to design his own games with his uncle. Pandemic was very successful and has many fans.
The growth of video games has actually helped board games become more popular. Many people play games on their phones, and this has made them more open to playing board games too. John and Zuzi's caf is very popular, and people enjoy playing games together in the same room.
In our modern world, where people often play games online, tabletop gaming has become a way to be together and have fun in the real world.

Jamie Scott is a successful music producer and writer. He has written many big hits in the UK. He says that it's important to keep trying and not give up, even when things don't work out at first. His mom was a good singer and taught him how to play the guitar. He listened to old music on the radio when he was growing up. He started playing the piano at school and wrote his own songs.
Jamie had to choose between playing tennis and music. He was good at tennis, but he didn't want to play it for the rest of his life. He left school at 17 to try to make it as a musician. He was in a duo with a friend, but they didn't work together for long.
Jamie's dad said he had to make it as a musician within 18 months, or he would have to get a job. Jamie worked hard and finally got a deal with a music publisher when he was 19. However, he had to split up with his friend and work on his own. He didn't become famous as a singer, but he found success as a songwriter.
Now, Jamie writes songs for other artists. He thinks this is where he's most successful. He helps new artists by writing songs that will be popular. Sometimes, he has to explain to them that it's okay to write songs that will be big hits. He just wants to write the best songs and make people happy.

Tony Connor is a famous person who does cool bike tricks on the internet. He is a street trials cyclist, which means he jumps from one hard-to-reach place to another on his bike. People watch his videos online and like him a lot.
I met Tony at a special bike park on a Saturday morning. Many kids and even older people knew who he was and came to say hi. They thought he was amazing. I was surprised too when I saw him do some tricks. He's very brave and creative.
Tony doesn't like being famous, though. He prefers to do his tricks instead of talking about them. He says it's hard for him to be nice to everyone who likes his videos. He likes to focus on his bike skills instead.
Tony thinks it's great that technology lets him make a living doing what he loves. But he also thinks it's weird that everyone is always taking pictures or looking at their phones. He likes to do things, not just watch others do them.
Tony is not a reckless person. He takes advice from experts to make sure he's safe. He knows that some people might think he's taking too many risks, but he says they don't understand the sport. He's just someone who feels scared, but he finds a way to overcome it. He plans carefully and prepares well before trying new tricks.
I hope this simplified text helps an A1 learner understand the main ideas and concepts of the original text!

Helen Skelton is a TV presenter who does many exciting challenges for charity. She has run a long way in the desert and gone on a small boat trip down a big river. For her latest challenge, Helen walked on a thin wire high above the ground. The wire was 66 meters up, and there was no safety net. She held onto a long stick to help her balance. Helen took lessons from a professional wire walker. She already knew some circus skills, but she found out that walking on a wire is very different. 
"It was a big surprise," Helen said. "I didn't know how strong I would need to be. Every day, I would run up a big hill, then do exercises, and then practice walking on the wire. I also learned how to fall safely if I slipped. It hurt every time I fell, but I had to stay positive. If I was scared and shaking, the wire would shake too!" 
The day of the challenge was windy, but Helen took deep breaths and walked slowly along the wire. It took her 15 minutes to walk the 150 meters. "That was the scariest thing I've ever done," Helen said afterwards. "I'm glad it's over!" Helen is already planning her next charity project: to go to the South Pole by skiing, kite, and bike.

Jeff Somers had a big dream. He wanted to travel around the world on a special bike called a penny farthing. It's an old-fashioned bike with one big wheel and one small wheel. Jeff had already traveled in a car and loved racing cars. He even built racing car engines. He used to ride his bike to work and to visit Amsterdam on holiday.
Jeff's trip to Amsterdam opened his eyes. He thought, "I want to see the world by bike!" But he didn't want a normal bike. He wanted to build his own special bike. He looked at old penny farthings in a museum to learn how to make one.
Jeff tried to start his trip twice before, but he had to stop because of a hurt knee. Finally, in 2006, he set off. He traveled to 23 countries on four continents for three years. The best part was when he saw Mount Everest in Tibet. People were amazed by his special bike.
The worst part was when Jeff got sick from drinking dirty water from a stream. He was in a hostel bed for 10 days without medicine. He didn't have money for a doctor or to go home. But Jeff says he would travel again tomorrow if he could afford it.

I work at a university in the United States. My team and I are studying water birds, especially the American black duck. We have a new tool called a 'night-vision scope' that helps us see the ducks at night. We're worried about the black ducks because their numbers are very low. We don't know if they have enough food on the east coast.
We know a lot about what they do during the day, but not at night. The new scope will help us see them clearly at night, even on dark nights. This will help us make better decisions about where they live.
It's hard work. We work four people, each working six hours a day. We have to go to different places and take notes about the ducks we see. The weather is not good - sometimes it's cold and wet. I need a lot of coffee to stay awake!
We haven't missed many days, except one when it was too snowy. I like this job because it's a challenge. In the summer, we'll work in a laboratory, looking at our results together. It will be hard to stay inside, but it's important to do this work. I wouldn't change it for anything!

I have a special job. People often don't believe me when I tell them what I do. I taste chocolate all day! My job is to make sure the chocolate we sell is the best it can be. I get small samples from our factory every week and I check them for taste, texture, and smell. I also taste the things we use to make the chocolate, like nuts and fruit. I choose the best ones to put in the chocolate. I have a special kitchen at work where I can test and taste the chocolate. I like to share it with my colleagues and make them happy. My kitchen has machines and ingredients to play with. It's nice to have a quiet space to go to during the day. Every day is different in my job. Sometimes I work in the lab and sometimes I go to other countries to buy things we need. This job is not boring because it's always different. The only thing I don't like is when I have to be away from my family. But I love my job and I love chocolate!

Do you want to learn circus skills? Sophia Grayson teaches circus skills to young people at Circus Experience. She says her course is popular because it teaches many skills, like juggling, throwing and catching balls, and flying through the air on a trapeze. On the course, students learn new things each time and parents can come to watch. Sophia says to be a good circus performer, you need to keep practicing and trying new things. It's also important to be friends with other performers and learn from them. You need to be fit and train every day to stay strong. Sophia says the best performers are those who want to be the best and never stop learning. Some people think circus performers get hurt or only work for a short time, but Sophia says that's not true. The real challenge is thinking about the future because you can only perform on the road when you're young. The course also teaches how to plan a business. Many students who finished the course started their own businesses and are happy to share their stories. Sophia warns that being a circus performer is not a way to make a lot of money, but it's a fun job.

You might not know her name, but you've probably heard her many times. Mariam Hobson is a special kind of singer. She helps the main singer by singing in the background.
