Some people think that people who sing in the background aren't good enough to be the main singer. But that's not true! They have to be very good. Mariam is a real star in the music world!
"I love my job because I never know what I'll be asked to sing," she says. "It could be a classical song, a jazz song, a hip-hop song, or a funny song for the radio or a commercial. Sometimes producers ask me to do something strange, like singing like a fish in the water! But I don't argue, I just do my job."
To be good at my job, I need to have good musical skills and be able to learn quickly. Sometimes there's no paper with the music on it, so I have to remember everything. I remember my first time recording music for a movie. It was very hard because there were eight of us singing different songs, and an orchestra too! I was very nervous because if I made a mistake, we would have to record everything again. That's not fun.
One of my favorite jobs is helping songwriters. New songwriters don't always know what kind of music sounds good with a woman's voice. By listening to me sing their song, they can figure out how to make it better.

Julie Deane started a successful business with her special bags. These bags are like the ones schoolchildren use. They are now sold in famous shops and many famous people use them. Before starting her business, Julie thought about different ideas, like making cakes or planning parties. She didn't choose the first idea that came to her mind. Some people didn't think people would want her bags, but Julie was sure they would be popular.
Julie worked with her mother, who helped her with the business. They designed the bags based on pictures from children's books. Julie didn't know much about fashion, but she learned a lot from fashion bloggers. At first, she sold only one bag a week. To get more people interested, Julie sent the bags to fashion writers and asked them to write about them on their blogs. This helped a lot, and more people started to buy the bags.
Now, Julie loves seeing which famous people are using her bags. She doesn't spend money on advertising like other companies do. Instead, she gets ideas from the internet and makes new and exciting designs. There was a time when another company copied Julie's design, so now she makes sure her team is very good at making the bags.
People who visit Julie's office say it's a happy place to work. Julie is proud of her team and her new factory. She knows that the team is what makes the office special.

Vicky Harmiston was a child who liked to play sports. Her parents let her and her brother decide what they did in their free time. Vicky chose to swim and was good at it. But it was hard for her to go to swimming lessons because they were far from her home. When she was a teenager, her brother got a special bike and started racing. Vicky thought it looked fun and wanted to try it too. She started cycling every day and did well. She liked it because she could go to training after school. Vicky became a good cyclist and won some competitions. When she was 28, she stopped competing. She said she got tired of winning and didn't feel excited anymore. But she found a new job with a charity called CycleZone. They help children who don't like sports. First, they teach them to ride a bike. Vicky likes this job because it helps children believe in themselves. The charity uses famous people to tell people about their work. Vicky thinks this is good because it helps people know about the charity's work.

Ana Ronson is a singer-songwriter from Ireland. She grew up in a house where music was always playing. Her grandfather taught her and her brother to play the guitar. Ana was shy and got nervous when she sang in front of her classmates. Her teacher suggested she join the school choir to help her feel more confident. Ana liked singing with her friends and wrote her first song, "Falling Stars", for her brother's band. She liked writing songs so much that she took a course to learn more. Ana wrote a song called "Something to Say" because she was upset that the teacher didn't listen to her ideas. She put the song on the internet and people loved it. A music company owner, Joss Alton, came to ask Ana to join his company, Isotope Music. Ana was hesitant at first, but Joss said he would let her write her own songs. Ana performed at a concert in Dublin and it was a big success. She likes writing songs about hard times, not just happy times. One of her favorite songs is about her brother stopping singing and how sad it made him. Ana wants to write songs that people can relate to.

I went on a big trip last year. I went on a boat with a group of people. My brother Harry wanted to write articles about the trip. He loves boats and I love exploring new places. I had always wanted to visit this part of Canada because my great-grandparents used to live there. I asked Harry if I could come and he said yes! There were big storms a few days before we left, but the weather was good when we arrived. We packed our bags and set off on our adventure. We saw dolphins and birds, but not many people. We stopped at the beach to look at the fish in the rock pools. They were very colorful! We made our own food over a campfire and had a lot of fun. We slept on the boat at night and it was very peaceful. When it was time to leave, I was sad. I didn't want to go back to my normal life. But I knew I had to go back to my family and friends. I was excited to tell them about my adventure!

My dad was a good basketball player in Germany, just like his father. When I was a kid, I went to watch him play many times. You might think that seeing all those games would make me love basketball, but it didn't. Instead, I liked to bring a book and read while I was there. When I started school, I was already very tall - two meters! My sports teacher asked if I wanted to play basketball with the team. At first, I didn't think I was good enough, but the teacher believed in me. I started playing and did well. I even played with a big team when I was 15. I went to a special school in the USA when I was 15 and worked with a great coach. He trains players for the Olympics! It was amazing. I missed my parents, but I got used to my new life. My English got better too! I became a professional basketball player at 18. I was taller than most players, but I was too light, so I had to work on that. I joined a team and never regretted it.

I was a student at college. I needed a part-time job to help pay for my studies. I decided to become a tour guide in my city, Chicago. I liked giving tours because I got to see my city in a new way. After I finished college, I decided to become a tour guide full-time. But I soon realized that it's not just about knowing the facts. I had to learn a lot more. I had to know how to answer many questions about the city, like about its history and architecture. I also had to know how to be entertaining and tell good stories. And, I had to be able to solve problems that might happen during the tour. For example, if a place was closed, I had to find an alternative. I want my tourists to be happy and have a good time. If they're not happy, they might write a bad review online. Good reviews help me get more customers. So, I try to make my tours fun and stress-free. I'm happy when my tourists are happy, and they often recommend my tours to others.

My name is Ella. I'm 22 years old. Last year, I went to Thailand with my sister Josie. She is five years younger than me. We went to a place where people take care of sick and rescued elephants. We helped the elephants by collecting their food. Elephants eat a lot of grass and bananas. It was hard work, but it was worth it to see the elephants happy. We also washed the elephants in the river. I had fun, even though I got wet! In the evening, we walked the elephants to a special place where they sleep. We stayed in the same house with all the other helpers. Josie and I shared a room, because she didn't want to be alone. It was hot and humid, but we knew it would be. The food was yummy, and we didn't eat meat. After dinner, we talked and played games with the other helpers. Now that we're back in the UK, Josie doesn't talk about Thailand much. But if someone asks, she says she loved it. I think she might be a little sad that she didn't enjoy it more. But she's happy she went. Maybe she'll go back one day. I will definitely go back!

My name is Gina DCosta. I run a flower shop in the UK. I sell flowers to many different people. Hotels and offices like to have flowers in their reception areas. Sometimes, I help with photo shoots for companies by providing flowers for their pictures. I even decorated a castle with flowers for a wedding once! It was a lot of work, but I was very proud of what we did.
My day starts early, at 4 am. I go to the flower market to buy fresh flowers. It's dark and cold, but I don't mind. I love my job! The market is amazing, with flowers from all around the world. It's hard to choose which ones to buy, because there are so many beautiful flowers. But I have to remember that not everyone likes the same flowers I do.
I have to talk to the flower sellers to get the best prices. Flowers can be expensive, so I need to make sure I get a good deal. Back at the shop, we prepare the flowers and make bouquets. Sometimes, customers are surprised by how much they cost. I have to ask them to think about what they want and how much they're willing to pay. I like my job because I get to make beautiful flowers for people. I wouldn't want to do anything else!

My city has a big cinema that shows new movies. I like going there, but I wanted to talk about the movies with my friends after we watch them. So, I started a film club with two friends. We don't rent a cinema. Instead, we pick a different place in the city each month. Sometimes we use an old factory. It's fun! We also use free places where the owners sell snacks and we can keep our prices low. We just want to cover our costs, not make a profit. We have our own equipment now, so it's easier to show the movies. We also know how many people are coming because we sell tickets online. When everyone says they had a great time after the movie, it makes us happy. We have a website and connect with other film clubs. We even visit them and learn new things. We also have a blog and put up posters in cafes. But the best way to find out about us is when people tell their friends. We also do fun activities with the movies, like a quiz last month. Everyone liked it!

'I loved taking pictures when I was a child. When I was 15, I wanted to take my pictures to the next level. So, I decided to take one picture every day for a whole year. Many people had done this before, but I thought it was a great idea. After a few weeks, I put my pictures on a website for young photographers. I was happy to see that others liked my pictures. I enjoyed taking pictures of many things, like nature and birds. Someone suggested that if my pictures had a theme, they would be even better. So, I started taking more pictures of nature and the sky. Some of my pictures were in black and white, which was different from what others were doing. Sometimes I doubted my project, but I trusted myself and my style. I showed my pictures to my art teacher at school. She told me about a big photography competition for people my age. I entered some of my pictures and won first prize! I was very happy because my project meant a lot to me. It was the first time I realized that my pictures were good and that I could be a professional photographer. Now, I have my own photography studio and I'm happy with my choice.'

I joined the National Youth Challenge (NYC) last year. They do fun things like camping and sailing, and they teach you new skills like speaking in front of people. I wanted to try these things because I'd never done them before. In the NYC, you can do different activities to help you grow and learn. There are different levels, from easy to hard, and you get a certificate when you finish each one. When I first joined, my leader said I should help organize activities at a children's club. I wasn't sure, but I wanted to get my first certificate. I helped at the club for two hours a week. It was fun! I made friends with the kids and we had a great time. When I finished the challenge, my leader let me keep helping at the club because I had become good friends with the kids. Now I go to the club for four hours a week and I love it. Helping at the club made me think about my future job. I want to work with children when I grow up. I never thought about this before, but now I know what I want to do. I've also become better at talking to people and helping others. I have several certificates now, and one of them is for camping!

I was born in Denver, USA. When I was eight years old, my dad took me to a snowboarding resort in the mountains. The hill was very steep, so my dad had to convince me to try it. I didn't know if I wanted to try, but my dad loved snowboarding and wanted me to love it too. I was a little scared, but I tried it and it was fun! After that, I started to love snowboarding and got better at it. When I was ten, I started competing. Some people get bored of snowboarding, but I like it more and more as I get older. I like not knowing what will happen next and sometimes I do really well. I even got a perfect score at a competition once! That made me feel more confident in my abilities. In the summer, I focus on training and studying when there's no snow. It's nice to have a break from a strict diet and to spend time with my friends. I think about my future and what I want to do. Snowboarding is very important to me, but I also think it's good to have something else to do in case I can't snowboard anymore or get hurt. Maybe I can become a doctor one day. It's hard to imagine not loving snowboarding, but I know I can't do it forever.

"When I was 15, I wanted things my friends had. I didn't plan for the future. One day, my best friend got a new phone, and I wanted one too. My parents said I could have it if I worked and saved money. So, I got a part-time job on Saturdays. I didn't like it, but my parents said I could start my own business instead. I saw my mom make necklaces, so I asked if I could try. I thought it would be hard, but it was easy! My friends didn't think it was cool, but I liked it. I sold my necklaces to my friends and family. They said they liked them, but I wasn't sure if they were really good. So, I rented a market stall with my mom. Many tourists came and bought my things to give to their friends and family. We got many orders from all over the country. People thought we were a big company, but we were just two people on a market stall! I knew it could work, so I made a website. Now, I make a lot of money through my business, mostly online. It's been very fun!"

Janine Stuart wrote a book called Being Amelia when she was 13 years old. The book is about a girl named Amelia who moves to a new school. Janine wrote about Amelia because she knows what it's like to be new in a school. Janine's family moved a lot when she was a child, so she had to make new friends often.
Janine started writing Being Amelia on a summer holiday when she was feeling bored. Her mom always wanted to write a book, and her teachers encouraged Janine to write too. Janine even won a prize for a short story she wrote the year before. When she finished Being Amelia, she sent it to a publishing company. They liked it and published it. The book is about Amelia's life, including her family and friends. Some people read the book and liked it a lot. They said Janine is a good writer and that her book is special.
Janine is still getting used to being a famous writer. At first, she was shy and hid when people recognized her in the street. But now she's okay with it. Janine says that young writers should find what works for them. For her, she likes to hang out with her friends and then write about what happens.

My name is Tom. I am 15 years old. Three years ago, my family and I moved to a castle on a small island. My father got a job to take care of the castle. He is very happy because it's a great opportunity. But my family and I were worried about living on the island. We didn't know what it would be like. We thought it might not be as comfortable as our old home. There is no school on the island, so I have to go to school on the mainland every day. I take a boat to get there.
The castle is not very beautiful, but our apartment is cozy. In the summer, many people visit the island, and we have parties on the beach. In the winter, it's quieter, and we only see our neighbors. They are very nice, and we help each other with things. The biggest change for me is traveling to school every day. Sometimes I miss the last ferry home, and I have to wait until the next one. But sometimes the views are amazing, like when the sun sets over the sea. Sometimes it's foggy, but then the sun comes out again. We also have big storms, and I worry about the castle. But it's been here for a long time, and it's still standing.

I live in a beautiful place in Scotland. I love nature and animals. Six years ago, I started a new hobby - watching birds! I went to the mountains with my family and saw many birds. My parents taught me how to tell the difference between birds and find good places to see them. It was amazing! After that, I joined a birdwatching club for young people. My goal is to see 200 different kinds of birds. I've seen many birds on family holidays in other countries. We look for places where we can see birds together. I went to Egypt and South America last summer. I didn't see my 200th bird, but it's okay. I learned that you need to be patient when watching birds. I made a video about my challenge and many people liked it. My teachers asked me to tell the school about birdwatching. I was a little nervous, but I did it! I think it's lucky to live in the countryside. There are many birds to see, even in cities with parks. I think birdwatching clubs should try to get more young people to join. Everyone should connect with nature, and it doesn't have to be expensive.

I started playing football when I was 7 years old. I would run home from school to play with other kids. I loved it! I got better and better, and my family thought I might keep playing it. And I did! I even dreamed of playing football when I grew up. When I was 13, a referee saw me play and thought I was good. He told the manager of a big football club, and she asked me to join her team. I was surprised because I didn't know girls could play in women's clubs. But the manager was happy with me, and I started training with the big club. I got better and better. Sometimes people didn't think I would be a good player, but my coach said, "Just be yourself and believe in yourself." He even let me play in a big match when I was younger than usual. I was so happy when we won, and my coach was cheering me on. Since then, I've scored many winning goals. Next month, my coach and I are organizing a football tournament to encourage teenagers to play football. We want them to see what it's like to play for a big team and to believe they can do it if they work hard. My advice is to have fun, but also be prepared for tough times. I've been lucky and haven't had many bad times, but I know it's important to be ready for them.

Research is important for students. It's not just for famous professors or scientists. Research is a way to learn and grow. It's a way to ask questions and find answers. You don't just repeat what you learn, you make new knowledge. 
Research is like asking "Why?", "How?", "What if?", and "Why does it matter?". It's a way to think about the world and make it better. 
You are already a researcher. You do research every day, even when you're not in school. You ask questions and find answers to solve problems. 
In school, you will learn to ask questions, explore, and think critically. You will learn to find answers and make new knowledge. It's okay to question what you learn and not just accept it. You need to think about it and make sure it's true.
Remember, research is important because it helps us learn and grow. It's not just for experts, it's for everyone.

Cities have been important places for learning and thinking for a long time. In the past, people went to coffee shops in London to talk about science and politics. In Paris, artists like Pablo Picasso liked to discuss art in cafes. But city life can be difficult. The same coffee shops that helped people talk also spread diseases. Picasso eventually left the city to live in the countryside.
Scientists are now studying how cities affect our brains. They have found that cities can make our brains work less well. One reason is that cities are very different from nature. Studies have shown that people who can see trees from their hospital windows get better faster. Even just looking at nature for a little while can help our brains work better.
Most people now live in cities. We don't live in big open spaces like we used to. Instead, we live in busy cities with many people. This can affect our health and how we think. When we walk in a city, our brains have to work hard to pay attention to everything around us. This can be tiring.
Scientists have found that cities are too full of things that demand our attention. Our brains need to work hard to ignore some things and focus on others. This takes a lot of energy. Natural places don't require as much effort. This is called attention restoration theory.
Philosophers and architects have been warning about the effects of cities for a long time. They think that we need to find ways to bring nature into our cities. Parks and gardens can help us relax and improve our brains.
Some scientists have found that the same things that make cities hard to live in also make them creative. The crowded streets and many people can inspire new ideas. So, we need to find a way to make cities work better for our brains while keeping their benefits.

Where do we find the mind? We usually think it's inside our heads. But maybe we should look outside too. Many things, like stones, tools, and writing, help us think and learn. 
We often study the mind by taking people away from their usual things and surroundings. This helps us learn about the brain, but it's not the whole story. The mind is not just in our brain. It's also in the things around us. 
I have a new idea called Material Engagement Theory (MET). It says that things can help us think and learn. For example, when we use a stick, it becomes a part of us. We use things to help us understand the world and to make new things. 
The human mind is like a project that keeps changing and growing. We use things to make sense of the world and to make new discoveries. This is why humans make things, and those things help make our minds what they are. I call this "metaplasticity". 
We should remember that our minds are connected to the things around us. MET helps us understand how different things, from old stones to modern phones, have helped us think and learn. We have been using technology to change our minds since we first evolved.

Photography is a very important invention that has changed the way we live and see the world. In the United States, photography became a big part of American culture very quickly. It was used in many different ways, from taking pictures for practical purposes to making art and entertainment.

Psychology is the study of our thoughts, feelings, and actions. It's like trying to understand how our minds work. William James, a famous philosopher, said that psychology is the'science of mental life'. This means that psychology helps us understand how we think, feel, and behave.
We all have our own thoughts and feelings, and we can't always know what others are thinking or feeling. This makes it hard to understand each other. Psychologists try to figure out what makes us tick by studying our behavior and making educated guesses about what's going on inside our heads.
It's like trying to solve a puzzle. Psychologists gather clues by observing people's behavior and then use those clues to make educated guesses about what's happening inside their minds. They also use scientific methods to make sure their guesses are correct.
Psychology is important because it can help us understand ourselves and others better. It can also help us develop new ways to teach children to read, design safer machines, and help people who are feeling sad or upset.
In the past, psychologists used to try to understand the mind by thinking about their own thoughts and feelings. But this method has its limitations. Today, psychologists prefer to study people's behavior and use that information to make educated guesses about what's going on inside their minds.

In the world, people like to think positively and not talk about their mistakes. This is because our brains are wired to think that good things will happen. But sometimes thinking positively can actually make us less motivated to work hard.

Others think that ability can grow through hard work and challenge. These people see failure as a chance to learn and get better. 
Dweck says that having this second way of thinking is better, even if it doesn't always lead to success.

This hormone makes them feel stronger and more confident.
So, why do teams do better at home? It's not just because of the crowd or the players' comfort. It's because of a combination of things, including teamwork, individual players, and the special feeling of playing at home.

If we were meant to live in the dark, we would be happy to go out at night. But we are not. We are creatures that like the light of the sun. This is because our bodies are used to living in the sun's light. We don't think about it much, but it's true. 
We have made the night brighter by putting lights everywhere. This is like building a dam to control a river. It's good, but it also has bad effects. We call this bad effect "light pollution". 
Light pollution is when we shine lights into the sky instead of keeping them down on the ground. This makes it hard for some animals to live. It also affects us humans. We need the dark to sleep and be healthy. 
In the past, people didn't have many lights. They used candles and lanterns. London, a big city, was very dark at night. But now we have many lights and it's hard to see the stars. 
Many animals are active at night. Light is important for them. Some birds get lost because of bright lights. They fly around until they drop. 
We thought light pollution only affected people who study the stars. But it affects us all. We need the dark to be healthy. If we don't have dark, our bodies get mixed up. This can make us sick. 
We are like frogs near a bright highway. We are trapped by our own lights. We have forgotten how to live with the stars and the natural rhythms of day and night. Light pollution makes us lose our place in the universe. We forget how small we are.

I bought my first metal detector after I got married. It cost 70, which was a lot of money back then. My wife, Marion, was impressed when I found a gold ring worth 80 on my first trip out. Over the years, I've found many other things, like brooches and coins, and each one makes me happy because it connects me to the past.
It took 40 years for me to find something that impressed Marion again. One rainy day, I decided to search a field near my home. The first time my detector beeped, I found a piece of an old wheel. Then, it beeped again. I couldn't ignore it, so I dug deeper. After a while, I saw a golden ball. I thought it might be a curtain rail, but as I cleaned it, it became clear it was a beautiful, intricate necklace. I knew it was special because I had seen something similar at the British Museum.
I took it home and showed it to Marion. We were both very excited. We didn't try it on because it was too valuable. We hid it in our wardrobe, but I was worried about it being stolen. So, I hid it in my office under a floorboard.
After 14 days, I had to tell the authorities about my find. I took it to the council office in a plastic bag. The man in charge was surprised and authenticated it. It was sold to my local council and is now in the British Museum in London. We got 350,000 from the sale, which we split. But the torc is more than just money. It's something I've saved for everyone.
People ask me if I'll stop detecting now, but I won't. I like finding new things, and there might be something even better next time.

I love sleeping when I travel. But I don't talk about it much because I feel a little shy. When my friends tell me about their trips and all the things they do, I smile and don't say much. I told him I was going to a place called Magadan in Siberia. I only had a one-way ticket and planned to ride my bike back to England. Sergei was surprised. 'There is no road,' he said. I told him I thought there was a road, but not many people used it.
Sergei asked if I was going alone. I said yes, but I would have a friend, Al, with me. Sergei didn't believe me. He said 'Holodna' (cold) and pointed outside. I showed him I had warm clothes, but I didn't tell him they were cheap.
I had an idea to ride my bike with Al from a lecture in Scotland. I wrote a note to him and passed it to my friend in the row in front of me. He said 'OK' and we planned to do it.
It took six years, but I was going to join Al in Siberia. I was a teacher, but I wanted to have more adventures. I had gone on two big trips with Al before, and this one was the biggest. Al was riding his bike around the world. He was very brave and did things that seemed impossible. He was happy and felt alive.

After the party, Lucy's grandfather said, "You did well, Lucy. I'm proud of you. Many people know who you are, and they think you're very good." Lucy liked being known and respected for her music.

'My dad said, "It's not good for you to spend so much time online. You should go out and see the world." But I wanted to know what experts think. They say that most teenagers who use social media have many friends, a good sense of who they are, and learn important skills. Simon Miles, an expert, says that social media is a normal part of growing up. Teenagers don't just use it to check emails like adults do; they live online. It's what you do with it that matters.
Jim Matthews, another expert, says that social media is like a virtual youth club. Teenagers use it to share jokes and gossip with friends, just like their parents did when they were younger. It helps them develop their sense of identity and learn to deal with problems and make friends.
Professor Keith Davidson says that social media can help teenagers find out who they are. They can share their interests and see what others like. He also says that it can be helpful for shy people to practice social skills online before doing it in person.
Professor Andrew Phillips thinks that social media can be good for quiet people who have special interests. They can connect with others who like the same things.
Pauline White, an expert on digital education, says that social media is becoming a creative force. Teenagers are making videos, podcasts, and blogs about things they like. They are also sharing photos and learning from each other. This will be helpful when they grow up and go to work.
Experts agree that teenagers who use social media creatively will have an advantage when they are adults. They will be able to work with others and create content to share with others.'

My parents planned a big road trip for our summer vacation. We drove across nine US states and one Canadian province. My dad wanted to do something different and fun. My mom and dad said, "Not many people do this anymore." My brother and I were a little worried. We packed our car with suitcases, food, and clothes. We set off on a big adventure.
We drove through Oklahoma and saw many things. We saw a big dust storm and had to stop for the night. We learned that cows have the right of way on the road! The next day, we went to the Great Sand Dunes and saw beautiful mountains. We smelled sulfur in a town called Pagosa Springs. We saw many old and new things everywhere we went.
We had some funny moments, like when we saw a "CLOSED" sign at a special place. We saw many wind farms and went to Yellowstone National Park. We saw bears and had to wait for them to cross the road. We even saw one bear up close! We stayed in a old hotel with no internet or phone. It was hard to leave, but we saw amazing views.
When we got back home, we were happy to be together again. We took many pictures and will always remember our trip. The things I'll remember are the unexpected and spontaneous things we did.

Rose is 16 years old. Her parents are separating for two years. Her father has a job in another country, and her mother will join him. Rose and her older sister Amy will stay in England. Amy will finish her school work at a college, and Rose will live with her grandmother, Daisy.
Rose doesn't know her grandmother very well. She has only happy memories of visiting her when she was 10 years old. Her parents didn't want her to live with Daisy at first, but Daisy wanted to take care of her. Rose's mother said it would be okay if Daisy promised to let her have some freedom.
Rose wants to be able to play music loudly, invite friends over, and go out without asking permission all the time. Her grandmother agreed. Rose's mother gave her a new phone so she can call for help if she needs it. Rose is happy because she will have more independence and her grandmother will trust her.
Rose will start a new school in five weeks. It will be her fourth school in five years, but she's used to it. She's excited to make new friends and start her final two years of school.

Charlotte Grainger wrote a book when she was 13 years old. Her teacher thought she might write a book one day. Charlotte started writing when she was 13 and her book is now being published. She was surprised that her teacher thought she would wait until she was 30 or 40 to write a book.
Charlotte's book is very good. It's a story about a girl and it's exciting. People are surprised that a 15-year-old wrote it. Charlotte is a smart and confident girl. She knows that she is lucky to have her book published.
Charlotte doesn't like it when books about teenagers show them as being bad at things or not knowing what to do. She wants to show that teenagers can be good at things and know what they want. Charlotte likes to read books about fantasy and adventure. She likes to learn about writing from other writers.
Charlotte's parents are journalists. They helped her get her book published. Charlotte knows that it's hard to get a book published, but she is grateful for her luck. She knows that writers have to work hard and be good at what they do.

We went to a special ski school in the US to learn freestyle skiing. Our instructor, Gareth, told us to go fast, not slow. One of our friends, David, went first and didn't do well. He fell down and lost his skis. Gareth said, "Speed is not always easy to control." I had never done freestyle skiing before and was a bit scared. I thought it would be fun to try, but I wasn't sure if I was good enough. 
At the school, we practiced on trampolines and small jumps. It was fun to bounce around and try new things. Gareth helped us and gave us advice. I had trouble at first, but I kept trying. Finally, I landed properly and felt proud. But then I lost my skis again! Gareth was happy for me, and I was happy too.

Imagine you're on a rollercoaster at an amusement park. You're scared and your heart is racing. The rollercoaster stops, then goes up slowly. Then it goes down quickly and you feel like you're flying. You might scream because it's so exciting! But you knew it was going to be scary when you paid to get into the park.
Many people love rollercoasters, but it's not just fun to ride them. Behind the scenes, there are many people working hard to make sure the rides are safe and exciting. They are engineers, designers, and marketing experts. They have to make sure the ride is not too scary, but still fun.
A rollercoaster designer is a very important job. They have to make sure the ride is safe and exciting. They also have to make sure it's different from other rides so people will want to ride it again. Some people might think that rollercoasters are getting more and more extreme, but most of the ideas for new rides come from a man named John Miller who invented some of the first rollercoasters a long time ago.
I talked to some experts who design rollercoasters. They said that the most important thing is to make sure the ride is safe and fun. They have to balance the thrill of the ride with making sure people don't get too scared. They also have to think about what kind of story they want to tell with the ride, like a space adventure or a jungle chase. They have to use all of these ideas to make a ride that people will love.
One expert said that the best rollercoaster designers are people who love rollercoasters themselves. They know what makes a ride exciting and can test the ride before it opens to the public. Another expert said that even with new technology like virtual reality, the physical rollercoaster experience will always be the best.

Miranda Ellington is a choreographer. She is 25 years old and has already worked with many theaters and dance companies. She still likes to dance sometimes. I asked her why she does both jobs. She said that dancing again reminds her of what it was like to be a dancer and how hard it can be. As a choreographer, she likes working with young students. They are open to new ideas and are eager to learn. They don't know what they can and can't do, so they listen to her advice.
When Miranda starts working with a new group, she focuses on the dance steps and the music. She tries to make the best dance routine for the music, even if she doesn't like the music. If the dancers don't like the music, she tries to find a solution. She likes to work with different people and companies, but she has to adapt to each one's way of working.
I asked her about a recent documentary about ballet dancers and choreographers. She said it was a good documentary because it showed the hard work and dedication that goes into being a dancer. She said that people often don't understand how hard it is.
I asked her what makes a good dance production. She said that it's when everything comes together - the music, costumes, lighting, and dancers. She said that aiming high is important, even if it's not perfect. She has worked on many different projects and doesn't like to be labeled as just a modern dance choreographer or a ballet specialist. She wants to keep trying new things.

I went on a big adventure with my friends. Someone asked me why I travel when I can watch TV at home. I said, "Why sit at home when there's so much to see outside?" This made me think of a new idea. A friend was giving away his old sofa, so I took it and fixed it to make it special. I put my bag on it and slept on it every night, even on the beach once. Some friends joined me and helped pull the sofa along. This was a new kind of adventure for me. I walked a long way and could stop at cafes to rest and have a coffee. People would ask me, "Why are you doing this?" and I would say, "I'm not doing it for charity or training for a marathon. I just wanted to do something new and fun." You can see the story on my website.

'I read about a swimming trip in the sea around small Greek islands. I was excited because I'd never done a group trip before. My brother was busy, so I decided to join a group. The man at the port was surprised when I asked for a single ticket. I told him I was going to swim with a group of friends. He was still a bit confused, but he smiled and showed me to the boat.
We met our group on the boat, but we didn't have much time to talk before we started swimming. Our guides told us that a boat would follow us and help us if we needed it. We did a short swim to split into groups, then we did a longer swim. I was a bit nervous because I'm not used to swimming in the open sea. The waves were big, and I was swimming slowly. I watched the faster swimmers go ahead. I wanted to finish the swim, so I kept going. I was happy when I finished on my own.
The next days were the same: we got in the water, swam at a comfortable pace, and stopped to look at the beautiful views. As we swam farther, I got faster and happier. We didn't need the support boat much. I'm excited to go again next year.'

I like my job as a flight attendant. I get to travel to many places, like the US and Australia. I work with nice people and have a lot of free time. It's not a boring job, which is great for someone like me who is young. When I was a child, I went to a boarding school far from my family. I would fly alone and sometimes I would help the flight attendants serve food to the passengers. This made me happy. Later, I wanted to change my job and I found this new job. I was nervous before the interview, so I practiced what to say. I told them about my good qualities and my previous work experience. I got the job! I would recommend this job to others because it's a good job. I get to see many new places and meet new people. Sometimes, I don't have to work too much, and if I do have a difficult passenger, I know it will soon be over.

At my summer camp, I like seeing the children learn new things. Many children know how to swim and play table-tennis, but rock climbing is new for most of them. Some children feel a little scared, but with encouragement, they try and succeed. This makes them feel happy.
Some children miss their homes at first, especially the 10-13 year olds. We don't let them use their phones all the time. They can phone home after lunch, but not later. Most children get used to it after a few days and have a great time. We get some parents who call us many times to ask about their child. But sometimes, their child is busy playing or doing something else, so we ask them to call back later.
We also get some children who wear new, expensive clothes. These children sometimes argue when we tell them to change, but they understand why soon.

'Rock the Planet, a musical show, opened in London. It was already popular in the USA, where it won 'Best Musical' four times. But it was hard to find British actors who could also play music well. In the UK, actors can't do as many shows as they can in the USA. So, they needed twice as many actors. Luckily, they found many talented British actors. The show is very popular in London and is full every night. People love the songs that were popular in America.
I met Jamie, an 11-year-old actor in the show. He said it's great that he gets paid to play the guitar. He told me that the actors are very busy. They have school lessons every day at the theatre. Jamie misses his old friends, but his whole class came to see the show. They loved it, and Jamie felt proud.
Jamie and the other young actors like to play music together. They even let me join in and play a song with them. It was fun! Jamie was very good at playing the guitar and showed me how to play. I was happy when I finally got it right.
The young actors were already good musicians, but they had never played in a band before. They found it easy to play together, but at first, they forgot to smile when they performed. The show will be in London for another year, and it's worth seeing.'
